item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Kathleen Norris
item.description: "A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it." -- Kathleen Norris

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Kathleen Norris
item.description: "Laundry, liturgy and women's work all serve to ground us in the world, and they need not grind us down. Our daily tasks, whether we perceive them as drudgery or essential, life-supporting work, do not define who we are as women or as human beings." -- Kathleen Norris

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Kathleen Thompson Norris
item.description: "Just the knowledge that a good book is awaiting one at the end of a long day makes that day happier. " -- Kathleen Thompson Norris

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Being crazy isn't enough." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I meant what I said and I said what I meant. An elephant's faithful one-hundred percent!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "How did it get so late so soon?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You can get help from teachers, but you are going to have to learn a lot by yourself, sitting alone in a room." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "All alone! Whether you like it or not, alone is something you'll be quite a lot!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "They say I'm old-fashioned, and live in the past, but sometimes I think progress progresses too fast!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I'm afraid that sometimes you'll play lonely games too. Games you can't win 'cause you'll play against you." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "There's no limit to how much you'll know, depending how far beyond zebra you go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Christmas doesn't come from a store, maybe Christmas perhaps means a little bit more...." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Be awesome! Be a book nut!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "When he worked, he really worked. But when he played, he really PLAYED." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "How did it get so late so soon? It's night before it's afternoon. December is here before it's June. My goodness how the time has flewn. How did it get so late so soon?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "For a host, above all, must be kind to his guests." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Bdiz add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges
